verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We belong to the Lion of Judah; we are Abraham's seed
We belong to the God and creator of everything
Let us raise up a covenant chorus; let us bring forth our lives
To the one whose host gathers among us and fills the skies

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And raise up His name on high
Raise up, you people of His pride
Raise up and bear the fire that's in our eyes
And in our lives and shows that we are not afraid

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In His light we can never be hidden; in His love we are healed
We will shine through the night like a city upon a hill

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
So raise up His name on high
Raise up, you people of His pride
Raise up and bear the fire that's in our eyes
And in our lives and shows that we are not afraid
No we are not afraid; no we are not afraid

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He delivers his people from bondage, sets the prisoner free
He has given us love and salvation, His eternal legacy
He will spare us the sword of His anger; he prepares us a home
Where we'll worship in glory forever before His throne
